slide.title: A student, who received shotgun pellets on the back at Rajshahi University campus is being taken to hospital yesterday. Police, however, claimed that they only fired shots in the air. Photo: Star
Chhatra League men attack a student on campus. Photo: Star
Students who were injured in the “police firing” and Chhatra League attack are being taken away for treatment. Photo: STar
Students who were injured in the “police firing” and Chhatra League attack are being taken away for treatment. Photo: Star
